description:

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
It’s become often reported that Netflix will have prematurely canceled a series. For one particular fan-favorite series, however, the opposite has become true. This series was only intended to be a limited-event miniseries, but due to its success, Netflix has greenlit the show for a second season. This exciting announcement for fans of the series [...]

title: Fan-Favorite Netflix Series Returning For Second Season

description:
